title: P2P Offer Create (request)
description: Creates a P2P (Peer to Peer) offer. Can only be used by an approved P2P agent.

type.description: Whether this is a buy or a sell.

amount.description: The total amount of the offer, in agent's account currency.

country.description: [Optional] The target country code of the offer. If not provided, will use client's residence by default.

local_currency.description: [Optional] Local currency for this offer. If not provided, will use the currency of client's residence by default.

max_amount.description: Maximum allowed amount for the orders of this offer, in agent's `account_currency`. Should be less than or equal to total `amount` of the offer.

min_amount.description: Minimum allowed amount for the orders of this offer, in agent's `account_currency`. Should be less than `max_amount`.

offer_description.description: Notes from the agent. Should include contact details and payment instructions.

rate.description: Conversion rate from agent's account currency to `local_currency`.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
